title: Monday Mini: Women and the Farmers' Protest
itunes:title: Monday Mini: Women and the Farmers' Protest
description:
Women of all ages have been playing a hugely significant role in India's Farmers' Protests. Anney and Samantha look into the role of women in these protests and as farmers in India.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
